alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:35AM EST until January 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a few hundreths of an inch. * WHERE...Caroline, Western Hanover, Western Chesterfield and Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) Counties. * WHEN...From this morning through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia, please call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
